DESCRIPTION: Displays a list of the functions that are available in ColdFusion.
EXAMPLE: <!----- This example shows the use of GetFunctionList. ----> <cfset fList = GetFunctionList()> <cfoutput>#StructCount(fList)# functions<br><br> </cfoutput> <cfloop COLLECTION = "#fList#" ITEM = "key"> <cfoutput>#key#<br> </cfoutput> </cfloop>
